posts.post_content:
I have the following raw cards available for trade/sale.  My want list is below.  I would prefer to trade, however, I have added sale prices (includes delivery) as well.  Please contact me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] or send a PM.  Preferred method of payment is PayPal FF.  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions, comments or concerns.

Helm Hindu VG+ $375 - MC on front with slight corner creases in the upper left corner.  The back is very clean
McCauley Hindu G-VG- $425 - Rounding corners with a crease that runs from the E in McCauley to the right collar.  Chipping on the front near the lower left corner and above the U in McCauley (both very small spots).  Creases on the left border (possible rubber band?).  The back is clean.

Trade List:  SL w/Hindu Back - G-VG
Greminger
Guiheen
Hooker
Howard
Lafitte
Mullaney
Otey
Paige
Perdue

or any HOF with a more difficult back (Hindu/Broad Leaf/AB etc.)

Thanks,

Tom
